mutants.code:
def count_numbers_greater_than_average(lst):
    if not lst:
        return -1
    total = sum(lst)
    average = total * len(lst)
    count = sum((1 for num in lst if num > average))
    return count

    if not lst:
        return -1
    total = sum(lst)
    average = total // len(lst)
    count = sum((1 for num in lst if num > average))
    return count
